title: iPhone 16 Launch Today: Apple Brings AI Features To iPhone 16. Details Here
content: Apple is set to unveil its iPhone 16 lineup today, focusing on how its flagship device's features have been infused with artificial intelligence, rather than its usual emphasis on hardware upgrades.
summary: Apple is set to unveil its iPhone 16 lineup today, focusing on how its flagship device's features have been infused with artificial intelligence, rather than its usual emphasis on hardware upgrades.

title: French Retail Giant Carrefour To Return To India By June 2025
content: French retail giant Carrefour announced Monday that it will return to India by June 2025 in a franchise partnership with Dubai firm Apparel Group, a decade after leaving the country.
summary: French retail giant Carrefour announced Monday that it will return to India by June 2025 in a franchise partnership with Dubai firm Apparel Group, a decade after leaving the country.

title: Will Zelensky Visit India This Year? Ukraine Envoy Says...
content: Ukraine's Ambassador to India, Oleksandr Polishchuk, said on Monday that President Volodymyr Zelenskyy may visit India by the end of the year following an invitation extended by Prime Minister Narendra Modi.
summary: Ukraine's Ambassador to India, Oleksandr Polishchuk, said on Monday that President Volodymyr Zelenskyy may visit India by the end of the year following an invitation extended by Prime Minister Narendra Modi.

title: Trump vs Harris Debate: Here Are The Rules

title: What Is The Key Difference Between Heart Attack And Cardiac Arrest
content: The heart is a muscle that contracts to work as a pump. When it contracts it pushes blood  containing oxygen and nutrients  to all the tissues of our body.

title: El Salvador Police Chief, Man Accused Of $35 Million Fraud Killed In Crash

title: Minors Raped, Women Trafficked: The Murky World Of "Appointed Son Of God"
content: Late on Sunday in the southern Philippines, police arrested Apollo Quiboloy, a self-proclaimed "Appointed Son of God" and pastor of the Kingdom of Jesus Christ (KOJC) church, after an extensive manhunt spanning more than two weeks.

title: Plane Carrying 48 Passengers Skids Off Indonesia Runway, Several Injured
content: A plane with 48 people aboard skidded off the runway in Indonesia's remote eastern region of Papua on Monday, police said, injuring several passengers.

title: PM, UAE Crown Prince Hold Bilateral Talks, Sign Agreements

title: Why Night Owls Are At Higher Risk Of Diabetes
content: Night owls -- a person who is habitually active or wakeful at night -- tend to have a higher body mass index (BMI), larger waists, and more hidden body fat and thus are almost 50 per cent more likely to develop type 2 diabetes (T2D).
summary: Night owls -- a person who is habitually active or wakeful at night -- tend to have a higher body mass index (BMI), larger waists, and more hidden body fat and thus are almost 50 per cent more likely to develop type 2 diabetes (T2D).

title: Historian's 13-Key Method Predicts A Kamala Harris Win In US Election

title: AI Started As A Dream To Save Humanity. Then, Big Tech Took Over.
